messages.content: You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list me employees from Marketing

SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  department
FROM employees
WHERE
  department = 'Marketing';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
give me the count how may employees who are from Australia?

SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT T1.employee_id)
FROM employees AS T1
INNER JOIN employee_addresses AS T2
  ON T1.employee_id = T2.employee_id
WHERE
  T2.country = 'Australia';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
tell me name of employee who is from India

SELECT 
first_name,
last_name
FROM 
employees e
JOIN 
employee_addresses a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id
WHERE a.country = 'India';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
name of that employee

SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name
FROM employees;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Australian employee name

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name
FROM employees e
JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id
WHERE ea.country = 'Australia';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
give me the name again
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list the names of all HR
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Hr who are salary is greater then 5000
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
emp names whos manage is James Tate

SELECT
  e.first_name,
  e.last_name
FROM employees AS e
WHERE
  e.manager_id IN (
    SELECT
      employee_id
    FROM employees
    WHERE
      first_name = 'James' AND last_name = 'Tate'
  );
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list me employees from Marketing name start with M

SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  department
FROM employees
WHERE
  department = 'Marketing' AND first_name LIKE 'M%';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list the names of all HR whoes name end with s
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list me employees from Marketing in ascending order by name

SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  department
FROM employees
WHERE
  department = 'Marketing'
ORDER BY
  first_name,
  last_name;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list me employees from Marketing in ascending order by name with emp id and address

SELECT
  e.employee_id,
  e.first_name,
  e.last_name,
  ea.street,
  ea.city,
  ea.state,
  ea.postal_code,
  ea.country
FROM employees AS e
LEFT JOIN employee_addresses AS ea
  ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id
WHERE
  e.department = 'Marketing'
ORDER BY
  e.first_name ASC,
  e.last_name ASC;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
list the names of all HR whoes first name end with s
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
give me all employee address whos name is james

SELECT
  ea.*
FROM employee_addresses AS ea
JOIN employees AS e
  ON ea.employee_id = e.employee_id
WHERE
  e.first_name = 'James';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
give me all countries name
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM employee_addresses;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
how many employees are in Hercules project

SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT ep.employee_id) AS num_employees
FROM employee_projects AS ep
WHERE
  ep.project_name = 'Hercules';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
give me full name of all the employees who are working with Apollo project and live in Delaware state

SELECT
  e.first_name,
  e.last_name
FROM employees AS e
JOIN employee_projects AS ep
  ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id
JOIN employee_addresses AS ea
  ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id
WHERE
  ep.project_name = 'Apollo' AND ea.state = 'Delaware';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Now give all name other then HR
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List all employees' first and last names
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Give me all unique job titles
SELECT DISTINCT job_title FROM employees;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Show employees who work in the HR department
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the count of employees in each department
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM employees GROUP BY department;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
What is the average salary of employees in Marketing?
SELECT AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees who live in Australia
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE ea.country = 'Australia';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Show all distinct cities where HR employees live
SELECT DISTINCT ea.city FROM employee_addresses ea JOIN employees e ON ea.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'HR';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the total salary by department
SELECT department, SUM(salary) AS total_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find the top 5 highest paid employees
SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 5;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees with their project names
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ep.project_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Count how many employees are assigned to each project
SELECT ep.project_name, COUNT(ep.employee_id) AS employee_count FROM employee_projects ep GROUP BY ep.project_name;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List all managers and their direct reports

SELECT m.first_name AS manager_first_name, m.last_name AS manager_last_name, e.first_name AS employee_first_name, e.last_name AS employee_last_name FROM employees e JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find employees who do not have a manager
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE manager_id IS NULL;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get employees and their office addresses
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ea.street, ea.city FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE ea.address_type = 'Office';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find all employees working on projects that started after 2023-01-01
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ep.project_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.start_date > '2023-01-01';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Which employees are not assigned to any project?
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.project_id IS NULL;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get employees who earn more than their manager
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id WHERE e.salary > m.salary;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List departments with average salary above 80000
SELECT department, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(salary) > 80000;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find employees working in more than one project

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, COUNT(ep.project_id) AS project_count FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_id HAVING COUNT(ep.project_id) > 1;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the most recent hires in each department
SELECT e1.department, e1.first_name, e1.last_name, e1.hire_date FROM employees e1 WHERE e1.hire_date = (SELECT MAX(e2.hire_date) FROM employees e2 WHERE e1.department = e2.department);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List all employees along with their city and country
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ea.city, ea.country FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Show the number of employees per country
SELECT ea.country, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS cnt FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id GROUP BY ea.country;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find employees who joined before their manager
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id WHERE e.hire_date < m.hire_date;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find the second highest salary in the company
SELECT MAX(salary) AS second_highest_salary FROM employees WHERE salary < (SELECT MAX(salary) FROM employees);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the top 3 highest salaries in each department

SELECT department, first_name, last_name, salary FROM ( SELECT department, first_name, last_name, salary, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY salary DESC) AS rn FROM employees ) ranked WHERE rn <= 3;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees who earn more than the average salary of their department

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, e.department, e.salary FROM employees e JOIN (SELECT department, AVG(salary) AS dept_avg FROM employees GROUP BY department) d ON e.department = d.department WHERE e.salary > d.dept_avg;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find the project with the maximum number of employees assigned
SELECT ep.project_name FROM employee_projects ep GROUP BY ep.project_name ORDER BY COUNT(ep.employee_id) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the highest paid employee in each city

SELECT ea.city, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.salary FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE e.salary = (SELECT MAX(e2.salary) FROM employees e2 JOIN employee_addresses ea2 ON e2.employee_id = ea2.employee_id WHERE ea2.city = ea.city);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Show all managers who manage more than 5 employees
SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS report_count FROM employees m JOIN employees e ON m.employee_id = e.manager_id GROUP BY m.employee_id HAVING COUNT(e.employee_id) > 5;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find employees who live in the same city as their manager

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ea.city FROM employees e JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id JOIN employee_addresses ma ON m.employee_id = ma.employee_id WHERE ea.city = ma.city;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees who are the only person in their department
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, e.department FROM employees e WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees e2 WHERE e2.department = e.department) = 1;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find projects that have employees from more than one department
SELECT ep.project_name FROM employee_projects ep JOIN employees e ON ep.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY ep.project_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT e.department) > 1;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the latest project assigned to each employee
SELECT ep.employee_id, ep.project_name, ep.start_date FROM employee_projects ep WHERE ep.start_date = (SELECT MAX(ep2.start_date) FROM employee_projects ep2 WHERE ep2.employee_id = ep.employee_id);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Show the cumulative salary cost per department ordered by hire date
SELECT department, first_name, last_name, hire_date, SUM(salary) OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY hire_date ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS cumulative_salary FROM employees;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find employees who never worked on any project but earn above company average salary

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, e.salary FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.project_id IS NULL AND e.salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Which department has the highest average salary?
SELECT department FROM employees GROUP BY department ORDER BY AVG(salary) DESC LIMIT 1;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees who joined in the same year as their manager

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, YEAR(e.hire_date) AS employee_year, YEAR(m.hire_date) AS manager_year FROM employees e JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id WHERE YEAR(e.hire_date) = YEAR(m.hire_date);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find employees who are working on all projects their manager is also working on

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM employee_projects mp WHERE mp.employee_id = m.employee_id AND mp.project_id NOT IN (SELECT ep.project_id FROM employee_projects ep WHERE ep.employee_id = e.employee_id));
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the average number of projects per employee by department

SELECT e.department, AVG(project_count) AS avg_projects FROM (SELECT e.department, e.employee_id, COUNT(ep.project_id) AS project_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_id, e.department) t GROUP BY t.department;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees who live in cities where no Marketing employees live

SELECT DISTINCT e.first_name, e.last_name, ea.city FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE ea.city NOT IN (SELECT ea2.city FROM employees e2 JOIN employee_addresses ea2 ON e2.employee_id = ea2.employee_id WHERE e2.department = 'Marketing');
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find the ratio of employees to managers in each department
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) / COUNT(DISTINCT manager_id) AS ratio FROM employees GROUP BY department;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees who have the same last name as any other employee in the company
SELECT e1.first_name, e1.last_name FROM employees e1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM employees e2 WHERE e1.last_name = e2.last_name AND e1.employee_id <> e2.employee_id);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List the 5 most recently hired employees with their hire date
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find the department with the lowest total salary
SELECT department FROM employees GROUP BY department ORDER BY SUM(salary) ASC LIMIT 1;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Show the count of employees hired each year
SELECT YEAR(hire_date) AS year, COUNT(*) AS hires FROM employees GROUP BY YEAR(hire_date) ORDER BY year;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get employees who have both 'Home' and 'Office' addresses

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea1 ON e.employee_id = ea1.employee_id AND ea1.address_type = 'Home' JOIN employee_addresses ea2 ON e.employee_id = ea2.employee_id AND ea2.address_type = 'Office';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List employees working on the longest running project

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ep.project_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM employee_projects ORDER BY DATEDIFF(IFNULL(end_date, CURDATE()), start_date) DESC LIMIT 1);
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get employees with salary above the global average and living in the United States

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, e.salary FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE e.salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees) AND ea.country = 'United States';
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Find managers who earn less than at least one of their direct reports
SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name FROM employees m JOIN employees e ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id WHERE m.salary < e.salary;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Which employees work in the same project as 'Michael Johnson'?

SELECT DISTINCT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.project_id IN (SELECT ep2.project_id FROM employee_projects ep2 JOIN employees e2 ON ep2.employee_id = e2.employee_id WHERE e2.first_name = 'Michael' AND e2.last_name = 'Johnson');
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
Get the average salary of employees by city
SELECT ea.city, AVG(e.salary) AS avg_salary FROM employees e JOIN employee_addresses ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id GROUP BY ea.city;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
List the first and last names concatenated as full_name for all employees
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM employees;
You are an expert MySQL assistant. Generate valid SQL only.
